meanings.definition: A person who is knowledgeable in many different fields.
meanings.sent1: Generalists can provide a wide range of information.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a generalist because she knows a little about everything.
meanings.sent3: The generalists at the trivia night amazed everyone with their diverse knowledge.
meanings.sent4: In a world of specialists, she stood out as a generalist, able to adapt to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The generalists in the group were like walking encyclopedias, always ready to share their wisdom.

meanings.definition: A physician whose practice is not limited to one specialty.
meanings.sent1: The hospital hired more generalists to cater to a wider range of patients.
meanings.sent2: He decided to become a generalist so he could treat various medical conditions.
meanings.sent3: The generalists in the clinic joked that they were the 'jack-of-all-trades' of medicine.
meanings.sent4: She admired how the generalists could diagnose different illnesses with ease.
meanings.sent5: The generalists' approach to medicine was like a breath of fresh air in the healthcare system.
